title: is it still possible to get golden championship skins?
body: and will it be available after the event ends/up till they expire 3/12/18?

replies.body:
In the fine print that some regions were also missing (that's a fun time isn't it?), Worlds loot (golden chromas and such):

>Also returns November 16, 2018 at 8:00 a.m. PT â€“ November 19, 2018 at 11:59 p.m. PT
